name: Cocoon (Quote Unquote Studio LLC)
description:
Cocoon is a short, horror experiment made during the 2013 Oculus VR Jam. Inspired by an errie, supposedly psychological test we found online. Originally we wanted to tell a story based around social anxiety but just didn't have time to flesh it out.

The game is playable without VR but also works with the original Oculus DK1. To play in VR have the Oculus DK1 plugged in and begin the game without the headset on - wear it after entering a name.
